message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase this product. Given its incredible value, I believe a starting price of $1,150,000 is fair.  What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of similar products.
Bob, I appreciate your counter-offer, but $900,000 is significantly below its true value.  I'm willing to be flexible, how about we meet in the middle at $1,075,000?
I understand your concerns, but I still think $900,000 is a fair price. I'm willing to compromise, but I can only go up to $950,000. Can you meet me halfway?

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but the gap between our positions is still quite large.  To be frank, $950,000 undervalues the product significantly. I'm willing to come down to $1,050,000, but that's my final offer. It's a fair deal considering its worth.

I understand that you're trying to make a fair deal, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last offers, which would be $1,025,000. Can you consider this compromise?
